newsitem.title: ITALY: Italy's Istat says Venice CPI data due Nov 22.
newsitem.headline: Italy's Istat says Venice CPI data due Nov 22.

text.p: Italy's national statistics institute Istat said on Friday preliminary inflation figures from Venice would be released on November 22, not on November 20 as it had earlier stated.
Istat said in a statement the original date had been issued in error but it confirmed the figures would be released at 1630 gmt.
Preliminary November inflation data from nine other major Italian cities will be released between November 20 and 22.
